name: Cube Control 1
description:
This Game Is About A Yellow Cube in a mysterious world. This world was and it is infected by an ancient evil that wants to conquer this wonderful and happy world ! Now it is you who need to save this world !

Basic Controls : (A) and (D) to move right and left, (W) and (Space) to jump

Walkthrough, Tips And Tricks, Speedruns and More on my channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO6jfswsXKBcjkM9TLVu9lA
